choices: She finds a package waiting for her when she gets home
She just instantly changes somewhere on campus
She prays and makes a wish
She comes across an ad looking for students to volunteer in an experiment
1.content: Sara sighed as she woke up in her king size bed "Why do I even have this bed? I'm the size of a grade schooler!" She huffed and jumped out of bed getting ready for her classes today. She was quite the bookworm when it came to her studies. A cute little nerd who enjoyed reading and playing games, but could not turn any heads due to her small stature. She stood 4'6 and was only 90 lbs, very small for a 21 year old. "I wish I could be like Sam.." Her roommate Samantha was a big athlete at the college and stood a whopping 6'3 at 18 years old. Quite the amazon especially in Sara's eyes. She shrugged and got dressed heading off to class. It was getting late so she had to hurry out the door.
1.title: The Origin

11.content: When she arrives home in the afternoon she finds a small package with her name on it "I wasn't expecting a package. Hmmm there's no return address." She heads up to her room opening it up and it is...
11.title: She finds a package waiting for her when she ge...

choices: She grows taller and very muscular
111.content: She examined the strange gun "What is this some kind of toy?" She took a closer look and noticed a dial that had different settings making her laugh. "Haha what a joke. Sam probably sent this to me since she loves to tease me. Okay Sam, I'll play along." She turns the dials, points it at her self pulling the trigger
111.title: A ray gun

1111.content: "oh my god..." A beam of light is shot from the gun engulfing her body causing it to tingle all over in a warm, pleasurable sensation. She began to grow taller and taller. She watched in amazement as her body started to grow thick with muscles. She felt so weak with her dainty little arms and had arms strong enough to crush a car. The glowing stopped and she felt her body "Is....is this real?!"
1111.title: She grows taller and very muscular

11111.content: She starting rubbing her rock hard body causing a smile to creep across her face. "Oh my god! This is real! I cannot believe how big I am. How strong I am!" She posed in front of her mirror giggling as giant muscles flexed. "I gotta show Sam, maybe I'll change her around too" She calls Samantha up to her room and in walks the tall thin athletic girl "Where are ya shorty?" Suddenly Samantha saw two muscular arms wrap around her waist and pick her up like she was a child. She screamed and saw that it was Sara. "Sara?!! Is that you? H-how?? W-w-w-what happened to you?! Sara giggled and pat her head "Well shorty I got my hands on a new toy and I am going to change you now. She points the gun at Samantha and fires away.
11111.title: She loves it

111111.content: No wait! Samantha screams as she is hit by the glowing light and begins to silence as the pleasant tingle flows through her body. Soon she feels her body expanding.
111111.title: Samantha grows

1111112.content: Samantha begins ballooning up quite quickly beginning to scream "No Sara....stop this! I don't want to be fat!!" Sra smiles and says" Oh Don't panic, I'm just playing around Sam" Sara continues to hold down the trigger until Sam is at the weight of
1111112.title: Expands in fat

11111122.content: Samantha reacts in absolute horror still not believing that something like this is possible. She pats her stomach watching it jiggle for what seemed like an eternity. "how is this possible? Where...how...why..?" Just then she turned to face the mirror. Instead of the tall, fit girl she was familiar with, she saw an obese version of herself staring back at her. She jumps at the sight of herself and...
11111122.title: 600 lbs

111112.content: The ray hits Sam in her chest and she begins to dwindle in size. Is she just shrinking or is something else happening?
111112.title: Samantha Shrinks

1112.content: She was then bathed in a white light. Her eyes widened and mouth dropped open as she felt her body slowly expand.
1112.title: She gains weight

11122.content: The light vanishes and Sara looks down at her jiggling body. "Oh...my god....I'm so fat..." Slowly poking her stomach and watching it shake like earthquake, she lets out a small squeak. "How am I going to explain this to Sam? What will she say"
11122.title: She becomes 300 lbs

choices: She Escapes a Days Worth of College
She Goes on to Her Class In Shame
She Ends Up Sent to a Kindergarten
People Wonder Where Her Parents Are
12.content:
She soon found herself hurtling through the hallways towards her classroom. When she reached the doorway to her classroom, she noted the clock above it, stating that she was five minutes late. Of course she was late. Her zoology classmates couldn't just wait for her to show up.
A frustrated sigh escaped her. Angry thoughts swirled through her head becoming a blizzard. She tried to rationalize her feelings. She tried to calm down. Nothing happened for several seconds. Extreme pain soon clustered inside her head, spreading like a chill throughout her body. She resisted the urge to cry out. How could she be in pain right then? A flash of light blinded her for a few seconds. Her eyes remained closed for a few seconds as she adjusted to the sparks around her.
Her eyes opened, and she found the clock and ceiling looking like they were a lot higher than they were before. What had happened to her?
As she noted her reflection in a nearby mirror, her eyes widened. She did not look like a fifth grader. She looked. . . younger. Like she was a kindergartener. Panic rose inside her. This was a tragedy if she had ever known one.
12.title: She just instantly changes somewhere on campus

info.brief_description: This is a story about Sara, a petite girl wishing to be bigger.  You decide how she grows!
info.description: Sara is a girl too small for her age and wants to be treated like her proper age. You decide how she grows and what grows. Does she become a giantess? An amazon? A BBW? Or does something go wrong and she starts shrinking or becomes even younger looking. You decide and have fun!
